verse: Oh, be careful little eyes, what you see...(x2)
And He's looking down in love;
Oh, be careful little ears, what you hear...(x2)
And He's looking down in love;
Oh, be careful little eyes, what you see...(x2)
And He's looking down in love;
Oh, be careful little lips, what you say...(x2)
And He's looking down in love;
Oh, be careful little hands, what you do...(x2)
And He's looking down in love;
Oh, be careful little feet, where you go...(x2)
And He's looking down in love;
